评论概述: Comfortable Cotton Sleep or Workout Shirts
评论详情: We ordered this 2-pack SetWell oversized shirts for my son. The pack included an apricot and army green colored shirt. He typically wears Extra Large T-shirts, so based on the description and reviews, we ordered the 2XLs. I am glad we did this as they fit like XLs with just a tad more bagginess.  The shirts are 100% cotton, so most likely these will be used for sleeping in. Each of the colors has remained looking like new even after being washed and dried. You can probably buy 2 of these 2-packs for the same price as only 1 2-pack of the famous national brand. This is a great value and the quality is very high as well.  Workout T Shirts for Men Oversized Gym Loose Fit Tshirt Heavy Cotton Washed Vintage Faded Sleeping Tee Unisex Tops

The t-shirts are crafted from soft, high-quality cotton, offering a comfortable fit with a simple, clean design and no unnecessary graphics. The colors are my favorite, although availability was an issue on other colors. While they look good and feel comfortable, the $25 price tag seems high for basic shirts. I'm unsure how they will perform after washing, particularly regarding shrinkage and wrinkles, as I have yet to launder them. I plan to update this review after a few months to assess their durability and how well they hold up over time. If I had to guess, I'm sure they will last several months, although that's just an opinion and only time will tell. Aside from that, I would recommend these shirts to anyone.

I really like the stonewash look.  They fit a little small to size but are really comfy.  Also really love how they're 100% cotton.They're fairly heavy and well made.  I also like how the sleeves are a little longer than some others I've received in the past.  The actually go down to my elbow.

The faded effect is very nice on the black but not really evident or noticeable on the apricot.  These are nice and heavy cotton, no lightweight fabric here.  As such, I wouldn't really wear these in the summer.  More for cooler days in the spring and fall.  The only way I would have liked these better is if they didn't have any tags along the back collar.

Fit: Perfect Material:Perfect Colors: Pink is very nice. Distressed black is also nice.  Pretty happy with these shirts. Special shoutout to the sleeves which reach just to elbow.  Great shirts, good value.
